docs.title: Banks Step Up AI Governance Rollouts
docs.snippet: Major lenders expanded risk-triage pilots while adding quarterly bias reviews and detailed model cards to comply with updated supervisory guidance.

docs.title: Regulators Issue Unified Transparency Benchmarks
docs.snippet: The international oversight council released baseline metrics requiring 24-hour incident disclosures and evidence-backed evaluations for critical AI systems.

docs.title: Hyperscalers Boost GPU Supply for Multimodal AI
docs.snippet: Cloud vendors announced a 40% increase in inference-grade GPU capacity, citing enterprise demand for multimodal copilots across frontline operations.

docs.title: Hospitals Trial Human-in-the-Loop AI Triage
docs.snippet: Regional hospital networks deployed AI-supported triage with nurse validation, reporting shorter waits but highlighting the need for escalation training.

docs.title: Retailers Deploy Generative Agents for Flash Campaigns
docs.snippet: Global retailers tested generative content agents synchronized with sales telemetry to localise promotions and update offers every two hours.

docs.title: EU Considers Mandatory AI Provider Registry
docs.snippet: Draft legislation in Brussels would require high-impact AI providers to register model documentation, audit logs, and incident reports in a central EU system.
